results.description: Idea: Short volume divided by total volume on BATS to capture shorting intensity. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two fields (short and total volume). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (fields not vector). SUGGESTION3 not applied because coverage = 1.0. SUGGESTION4 applied: both fields have high userCount/alphaCount. Confidence set to 0.75 based on coverage and prior usage.

Idea: Cross-sectional zscore of recent 20-day zscore of BATS short ratio to find extreme shorting. Applied SUGGESTION1 (used ratio then ts_zscore). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Coverage high so no ts_backfill. Chosen fields have high user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.70.
Idea: 5-day returns of BATS short ratio to capture accelerating short activity (momentum). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 used high-usage fields. Confidence 0.65.
Idea: EDGX short volume divided by EDGX total volume as primary shorting intensity metric. Applied SUGGESTION1, SUGGESTION4; SUGGESTION2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.74.
Idea: ts_zscore of EDGX short ratio over 10 days to detect extremes. Used two fields per SUGGESTION1; coverage = 1.0 so no backfill. Confidence 0.68.
Idea: BYXX short volume / total volume to track short activity on BYXX. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 (fields have good user/alpha counts). Confidence 0.7.
Idea: EDGASH short volume divided by EDGASH total volume. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Cross-market short concentration (BATS vs EDGX) difference
results.description: Idea: Difference between BATS and EDGX short ratios to detect venue-specific short piling. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two ratio fields; SUGGESTION4 used high-usage fields. Confidence 0.66.

Idea: Average trade-size distribution (vec_avg) for BATS sumsize small-size vector to capture crowding in trade sizes. SUGGESTION2 applied (vec_avg). SUGGESTION1 limited to one vector field as vector provides aggregate. Coverage =1.0 so no backfill. Chosen because sumsize fields have high userCount. Confidence 0.6.

Idea: vec_avg of EDGX sumsize small trades to detect retail/algorithmic pressure. Applied SUGGESTION2; coverage high. SUGGESTION1 not applied beyond single vector due to focus on distribution. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: BATS sumsize avg to short-ratio (size-adjusted short pressure)
results.description: Idea: Ratio of vec_avg(sumsize) to total volume to capture whether shorting concentrates in particular trade sizes. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION2. Coverage high, SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.62.
Idea: vec_avg of EDGX sumsize small trades divided by EDGX total volume as size-weighted short pressure. Applied SUGGESTION1/2. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: Daily change in BATS short ratio to catch sudden increases. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.67.
Idea: 3-day change in EDGX short ratio to smooth noise and capture sustained moves. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage high. Confidence 0.66.
Idea: 7-day returns of BYXX short ratio to identify persistent short buildup. Used SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 (reasonable user counts). Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: BATS short ratio normalized by 30d mean
results.description: Idea: divide(current short ratio, ts_mean(short ratio,30)) to find elevated levels relative to month. Applied SUGGESTION1; coverage high. Confidence 0.69.
Idea: ts_av_diff(short ratio,20) to measure deviation from 20-day mean. Used SUGGESTION1; simple and robust. Confidence 0.66.
Idea: 30-day stddev of BATS short ratio to detect unstable shorting; low volatility regimes may mean mean-reversion. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: cross-sectional zscore of ts_returns of EDGX short volume (5d) to pick relative movers. SUGGESTION1 used single field transformed; SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.64.
Idea: subtract short-volume ratio from vec_avg(sumsize) normalized to detect concentration in particular trade sizes vs absolute shorting. Applied SUGGESTION1/2. Confidence 0.58.
Idea: vec_stddev on EDGX sumsize to measure dispersion of trade sizes (vector op). SUGGESTION2 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Short ratio pair: BATS minus BYXX
results.description: Idea: Relative short intensity between BATS and BYXX via subtraction to find venue rotation. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two ratio fields. Confidence 0.62.
Idea: quantile of BATS short ratio to map to distributional signal. Used single ratio field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio 60d mean-reversion (inverse of ts_zscore)
results.description: Idea: reverse(ts_zscore(short ratio,60)) to construct mean-reversion alpha on long-higher-than-average shorting. SUGGESTION1 used; coverage high. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: ts_ir(ts_returns(short volume, d), d) as stability-weighted short flow signal. Applied SUGGESTION1 and used ts_ir. Coverage high. Confidence 0.61.
Idea: ts_rank(shrt volume,10) to capture relative short volume momentum. SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.59.
Idea: ts_scale(short ratio,30) to normalize to recent range. SUGGESTION1 used; helps cross-instrument comparability. Confidence 0.63.
Idea: ts_returns(vec_avg(sumsize),3) to find rapid changes in trade-size distribution on BYXX. Applied SUGGESTION2 and SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: EDGASH sumsize to short ratio (size-adjusted signal)
results.description: Idea: divide(vec_avg(shrt43_edgash_sumsize_s_data1), shrt43_edgashvol_totalvolume) to detect trade-size weighted short pressure. Applied SUGGESTION2 and SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: BATS short ratio 5d zscore then quantile map
results.description: Idea: quantile(ts_zscore(short ratio,5)) to transform short-term zscore into distributional weight. Used SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.64.
Idea: ts_kurtosis(short ratio,30) to identify fat-tailed shorting patterns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high; SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.5.
Idea: vec_range(sumsize) to measure concentration across trade sizes on BATS. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Cross-venue total volume divergence (EDGX vs BATS)
results.description: Idea: subtract total volume between EDGX and BATS to capture venue rotation and liquidity shifts. Used SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: winsorize(ts_zscore(short ratio,20)) to reduce outliers before zscore. Applied SUGGESTION1 and winsorize operator. Coverage high. Confidence 0.62.
Idea: ts_rank of short-volume vs ts_mean(short-volume,14) to find short flow crossover (proxy). Used SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.58.
Idea: divide(ts_av_diff(short ratio,20), ts_std_dev(short ratio,20)) for a normalized deviation. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: BATS vec_sum of sumsize (total size across buckets)
results.description: Idea: vec_sum(sumsize) to capture overall activity in sumsize buckets (vector op). SUGGESTION2 applied; coverage good. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: EDGX vec_max of sumsize (largest bucket activity)
results.description: Idea: vec_max(sumsize) to detect spikes in particular trade-size bucket. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: BATS short-ratio rolling ratio of short to long-term mean (5d/30d)
results.description: Idea: divide(ts_mean(short ratio,5), ts_mean(short ratio,30)) to capture short-term shifts vs month. SUGGESTION1 used; coverage high. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio 3d zscore then reverse
results.description: Idea: reverse(ts_zscore(short ratio,3)) to implement short-term mean-reversion. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: BYXX short-volume day-of-change indicator (sign of ts_delta 1)
results.description: Idea: sign(ts_delta(short volume,1)) to indicate directional short flow change. SUGGESTION1 used; simple signal. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: EDGASH sumsize small vs medium bucket difference
results.description: Idea: subtract vec_avg of data1 and data2 sumsize small buckets to detect bucket shifts. Applied SUGGESTION2 and used both sumsize fields. Confidence 0.5.
Idea: ts_zscore(ts_returns(short volume,10),10) to combine momentum and normalization. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Idea: ts_arg_max(short ratio,5) to find if current day is max in last 5 days (indicator of spike). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.55.
Idea: vec_count(sumsize) to detect changes in active bucket count (vector op). SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Idea: use ts_regression to extract slope of short volume returns over 10 days as acceleration measure. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: tail(short ratio, lower=-inf, upper=0.8, newval=0.8) to cap extremes and avoid outliers. SUGGESTION1 used and tail applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: BATS vs EDGX short-volume ratio spread zscore
results.description: Idea: zscore(subtract(BATS short ratio, EDGX short ratio)) to normalize the spread. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.63.
Idea: ts_max_diff(short volume,30) to quantify drop from recent peak shorting. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.52.
Idea: quantile(ts_mean(short ratio,14)) to place 2-week mean in distribution. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: EDGX sumsize small bucket last-change days
results.description: Idea: days_from_last_change(vec_avg(sumsize)) to detect stale bucket behavior. Applied SUGGESTION2. Confidence 0.47.
Idea: ts_zscore(ts_mean(short ratio,30),30) to combine smoothing and normalization. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: BATS sumsize small vs EDGX sumsize small difference
results.description: Idea: subtract vec_avg(BATS sumsize, data1) - vec_avg(EDGX sumsize, data1) to detect trade-size reallocation across venues. SUGGESTION1/2 used. Confidence 0.55.
Idea: ts_product(ts_returns(short volume,1),3) to detect consistent direction of short flow over 3 days. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.5.
Idea: zscore(divide(short volume, total volume)) to produce cross-sectional ranking. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Idea: ts_returns(divide(shrt43_edgashvol_svol, shrt43_edgashvol_totalvolume),7) to capture week momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: BYXX short-volume relative zscore vs venue average
results.description: Idea: zscore(divide(byxx short volume, byxx total volume)) to gauge relative extremeness. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: vec_min(sumsize) to detect minimal bucket baseline. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.45.
Idea: ts_delay(short ratio,5) as a lagged predictor or feature. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: BATS short ratio 20d quantile then reverse
results.description: Idea: reverse(quantile(ts_mean(short ratio,20))) to form contrarian bets on high quantile. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.61.
Idea: ts_decay_linear(short volume,30) to emphasize recent flows. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.
Idea: ts_scale(short ratio,30) to normalize recent range to 0-1. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: BATS short-volume conditional trade_when on high total volume
results.description: Idea: trade_when(total volume > ts_mean(total volume,30), short ratio, NaN) to act only when liquidity high. Applied SUGGESTION1 and trade_when to limit noisy days. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: zscore(winsorize(ts_returns(short volume,10))) to reduce outliers then normalize. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: BYXX vec_avg sumsize divided by short ratio
results.description: Idea: divide(vec_avg(sumsize), short ratio) to detect when size concentration is high relative to shorting. SUGGESTION1/2 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: EDGASH short ratio 14d zscore then quantile
results.description: Idea: quantile(ts_zscore(short ratio,14)) to map zscore into distribution. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: BATS short ratio daily sign * magnitude (sign * ts_av_diff)
results.description: Idea: multiply(sign(ts_delta(short ratio,1)), ts_av_diff(short ratio,5)) to combine direction and magnitude. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio tail-trimmed mean (ts_backfill not needed)
results.description: Idea: Use ts_mean after winsorize to reduce extremes: ts_mean(winsorize(short ratio), 20). SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION3 not needed due to coverage. Confidence 0.55.
Idea: zscore(ts_returns(short ratio,2)) to capture very short momentum cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: BATS sumsize small bucket ts_arg_min 7 (recent trough)
results.description: Idea: ts_arg_min(vec_avg(sumsize),7) to detect when current bucket activity is minimum in week. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: EDGX short vs total volume ratio smoothed (ts_mean 5) zscore
results.description: Idea: zscore(ts_mean(short ratio,5)) to smooth and normalize. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: divide(short volume, vec_sum(sumsize)) to compare absolute short flow with size-bucket total. SUGGESTION2/1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: EDGX short-volume 5d rolling zscore then reverse
results.description: Idea: reverse(zscore(ts_mean(short volume,5))) to bet against recent extreme short flow after normalization. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: BYXX sumsize vec_range relative to mean
results.description: Idea: divide(vec_range(sumsize), vec_avg(sumsize)) to get dispersion ratio. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.46.
Idea: ts_ir(ts_returns(short ratio,1),10) to measure consistency of short ratio returns. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: EDGASH vec_avg sumsize compared to its ts_mean
results.description: Idea: subtract(vec_avg(sumsize), ts_mean(vec_avg(sumsize),30)) to detect change in bucket average. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.49.
Idea: ts_corr(BATS short ratio, EDGX short ratio,30) to find decoupling episodes. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: BATS short-volume 3d product of signs (flow consistency)
results.description: Idea: sign(ts_product(ts_returns(short volume,1),3)) to detect consistent direction of short flow. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio winsorized mean deviation
results.description: Idea: ts_av_diff(winsorize(short ratio), 20) to measure deviation after trimming outliers. SUGGESTION1 and winsorize used. Confidence 0.54.
Idea: ts_regression(short volume, ts_step(1), 21) slope to estimate trend in activity. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: BATS short ratio long-short mean crossover (5d vs 30d)
results.description: Idea: subtract(ts_mean(short ratio,5), ts_mean(short ratio,30)) as momentum/mean reversion hybrid. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio 90d extreme indicator (kth_element backfill)
results.description: Idea: kth_element(divide(short volume, total volume), 90, 1) to backfill first valid in 90 days when needed. SUGGESTION3 considered but coverage high so not required; included as robust option. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: BYXX short ratio seasonal weekly pattern (ts_step + ts_regression)
results.description: Idea: use ts_regression(short ratio, ts_step(1), 14) to capture linear weekly trend. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.47.
Idea: last_diff_value(vec_avg(sumsize),7) to detect last different value within week indicating regime change. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio 7d entropy proxy (vec_stddev of short vs sumsize)
results.description: Idea: subtract(ts_std_dev(short ratio,7), vec_stddev(sumsize)) as a crude dispersion-entropy proxy. SUGGESTION2 applied for vec_stddev. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: BATS short ratio 21d rolling min distance (ts_arg_min)
results.description: Idea: ts_arg_min(short ratio,21) to know recency of minima. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: EDGX short-volume 5d smoothed zscore then trade_when(high liquidity)
results.description: Idea: trade_when(totalvolume > ts_mean(totalvolume,30), zscore(ts_mean(short volume,5)), NaN) to only trade when liquidity supports. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: BYXX short ratio normalized by total volume volatility
results.description: Idea: divide(short ratio, ts_std_dev(totalvolume,30)) to scale by liquidity volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.
Idea: ts_kurtosis(short volume,14) to detect days with fat tails (stability signal). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio decaying signal (hump applied)
results.description: Idea: hump(ts_zscore(short ratio,10), 0.01) to limit turnover when using this alpha. SUGGESTION1 used and hump applied for turnover control. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: BYXX sumsize small bucket sudden surge detector (ts_arg_max 3)
results.description: Idea: ts_arg_max(vec_avg(sumsize),3) to detect bucket surge within 3 days. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: BATS short ratio 10d mean divided by std (information ratio)
results.description: Idea: divide(ts_mean(short ratio,10), ts_std_dev(short ratio,10)) as IR-like stability measure. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Idea: ts_returns(vec_avg(sumsize),7) to capture sustained changes in bucket average. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: BATS short ratio quantile of 3d momentum
results.description: Idea: quantile(ts_returns(short ratio,3)) to map short-term momentum into distributional weight. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Idea: subtract(ts_mean(short volume,5), ts_mean(short volume,20)) to detect acceleration in short flow. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: BYXX short ratio reversal after peak (ts_arg_max then reverse)
results.description: Idea: if ts_arg_max(short ratio,7)==0 then reverse(ts_av_diff(short ratio,7)) as contrarian. Simplified using reverse(ts_av_diff(...)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: BATS sumsize bucket change count (ts_count_nans as proxy)
results.description: Idea: ts_count_nans(vec_avg(sumsize),7) to detect missing activity days in buckets. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: EDGX short ratio normalized difference to BYXX
results.description: Idea: subtract(zscore(EDGX short ratio), zscore(BYXX short ratio)) to get relative extremeness. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: BATS short-volume transformed via signed_power (amplify direction)
results.description: Idea: signed_power(ts_returns(short volume,3), 1.5) to amplify directional moves while preserving sign. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.
Idea: normalize(short ratio) to remove mean bias across universe. SUGGESTION1 applied; normalize helps cross-sectional bets. Confidence 0.62.
Idea: ts_mean(vec_avg(sumsize),5) to smooth short-term noise in bucket averages. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: BATS short ratio sign * zscore (directional magnitude)
results.description: Idea: multiply(sign(ts_delta(short ratio,1)), ts_zscore(short ratio,10)) to combine immediate direction with normalized magnitude. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: EDGX short-volume normalized by monthly mean and stdev
results.description: Idea: divide(ts_av_diff(short volume,30), ts_std_dev(short volume,30)) to form a standardized deviation. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
